wikipedia_page.main: John Charles Pratt, 4th Marquess Camden  (9 February 1872 – 15 December 1943), briefly styled Earl of Brecknock in 1872, was a British peer.

response: *Lady Joan Marion Nevill (1877–1952), she married John Pratt, 4th Marquess Camden.

She married John Pratt, Earl of Brecknock, eldest son of John Pratt, 4th Marquess Camden, and his wife, the former Lady Joan Marion Nevill, on 19 October 1920 in St. Margaret's Church, Westminster, London. They had at least two children:
